Plotter

File for plotting data with matplotlib.

Authors:

Giuseppe Boccignone <giuseppe.boccignone@unimi.it> Renato Nobre <renato.avellarnobre@studenti.unimi.it>

Changes:

12/12/2012 First Edition Matlab 31/05/2022 Python Edition

class utils.plotter.Plotter(num_line=2, num_pics_line=5, fig_size=(15, 5), n_obs=1)[source]

Class for plotting data with matplotlib.

Note

Don’t need to instantiate this class, unless you want to plot the entire visualization with plot_visualization.

Parameters

  • num_line (int, optional) – Number of lines to plot. Defaults to 2.

  • num_pics_line (int, optional) – Number of pictures to plot in each line. Defaults to 5.

  • fig_size (tuple, optional) – Size of the figure. Defaults to (15, 5).

fig

Figure to plot the visualization.

Type

plt.figure.Figure

axes

Axes to plot the visualization.

Type

plt.axes.Axes

_clean_axes()[source]

Clean axes of the plot visualization.

classmethod _configure_axis(ax, title, keep_axis=False)[source]

Configure axis interface.

Wrap common aspects of plot axis.

Parameters

  • ax (axes.Axes) – Axes to plot the image

  • title (str) – Title of the plot

  • keep_axis (bool, optional) – Whether to show or hide the axis. Defaults to False.

classmethod _image_plot(ax, image, title, cmap='viridis', interpol=None)[source]

Image plot interface.

Wrap common aspects of image plotting.

Parameters

  • ax (axes.Axes) – Axes to plot the image

  • image (np.ndarray) – Image to plot.

  • title (str) – Title of the plot

  • cmap (str, optional) – Color map. Defaults to ‘viridis’.

  • interpol (str, optional) – Interpolation type. Defaults to None.

save_foa_values(foa_values, n_obs)[source]

Save foa numpy values.

Parameters

foa_values (np.ndarray) – Foa values to save.

save_complexity(complexity, n_obs)[source]

Save complexy data plots an numpy values.

Parameters

data (dict) – Data dictionary

plot_visualization(data, pause_time=0.001)[source]

Plot complete visualization for instance.

Plot all 10 plots for every frame.

Parameters

  • data (dict) – Data dictionary

  • pause_time (float, optional) – Time to visualize the plot. Defaults to 0.001 (for GPU issues).

Plot original frame.

Parameters

  • axes (axes.Axes) – Axes to plot the image

  • frame_sampling (obj) – Frame sampling object.

Parameters

  • proto_params (obj) – protoparams objetcs to plot.

  • num_proto (int) – Number of protoparameres.
